ValidationRule.description: If CIF Type is AGENCY BUYER then all fields are mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(CIF_Type__c, "AGENCY BUYER"), OR( (AND( ISBLANK(x3rd_Party_Agency_Name__c), ISBLANK( Client_Agent__c ) )), ISBLANK(x3rd_Party_Agent_Name__c), (AND( ISBLANK(x3rd_Party_Agent_Mobile__c), ISBLANK(x3rd_Party_Agent_Email__c) )), ISBLANK(NAME_OF_THE_OWNER__c), (AND( ISBLANK(Mobile__c), ISBLANK(E_MAIL__c) )), ISBLANK(TEXT( CIF_Lead_Source__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PLEASE FILL ALL THE FIELDS MENTIONED IN THE BUYER REQUIRED DETAILS SECTION AND AGENCY REQUIRED DETAILS SECTION.
